name: SnowReport
0:
”Alexa, ask Snow Report to tell me the snow report.”
”Alexa, ask Snow Report to give me the report.”
”Alexa, ask Snow Report to tell me the report.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: snow report
des: Driving up to the mountains for a weekend ski trip is a major time investment. Rather than searching snow reports on your screen, just ask Alexa to tell you what the snow reports look like for each ski resort located near Interstate 70. The reports will include information from the snow conditions published by each resort updated daily.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
